author: Peter Wright
content:
Incredible times. They have to be laid up somewhere and whenever the restrictions are over they will be at the point of least cost in getting the crews returned to their vessels and worked up. I see most have returned, it must be an incredible sight to see 20 plus super cruise ships anchored in close proximity.

I remember ships used to head for anchorages such as Hong Kong in typhoons but this illustrates the fragility and exposure these behemoths have to the elements.
